Description: Can't use power up because it's level locked.
US English: I can't eat that cat food until Wave {0}!

Description: Cant use power up because it's already in use
US English: I can only eat one cat food at a time!

Description: Can't use power up because user can't afford it
US English: Not enough money!\n\nSwipe two mice at once to earn more!

Description: Explain power up that increases speed
US English: Cat food helps me move faster!

Description: Explain power up that widens cat's field of view
US English: This cat food helps me see better!

Description: Explain power up that makes cat paws bigger
US English: Try new Giant Paws cat food!

Description: Explain power up that makes cat fart
US English: This cat food makes me toot!

Description: Explain general idea of power ups
US English: Buy me cat food when you need some extra help!

Description: Message when fast powerup starts
US English: I feel frisky!\n\nLet's catch some mice while it lasts!

Description: Message when vision powerup starts
US English: Better eyesight means less turning!

Description: Message when giant paws powerup starts
US English: No mouse shall escape my mighty paws!

Description: Message when fart powerup starts
US English: The mice slow down when things get a little stinky...

Description: Tutorial: explain you need to catch mice
US English: Yikes!\n\nI'd better catch that mouse!

Description: Tutorial: explain you show swipe ahead of mice
US English: I'll swipe where you tap but I'm pretty lazy.\n\nPlan ahead!

Description: Tutorial: explain you can turn faster by dragging cat's butt
US English: Drag my backside to turn me faster!

Description: Tutorial: explain the use of traps
US English: A trap will stop an escaping mouse, but then it's gone for good!

Description: Tutorial: explain game loss condition
US English: OH NO!!\n\nA mouse got away, I'm in trouble now!

Description: Tutorial: explain boosts run out after a while
US English: The catfood is all gone!\n\nBuy me more, but watch the prices!

Description: Caption on a picture of the real cat, Angus
US English: I got Angus in 2011 as a kitten. He was already named \"Angus\" and the name stuck: he was absolutely an Angus.

Description: Caption on a picture of the real cat, Angus
US English: I had just gotten a female kitten, Curry, and she was a bit wild. The vet suggested a boy cat would help her calm down.

Description: Caption on a picture of the real cat, Angus
US English: Angus and Curry became great friends. He would pounce on her occasionally. She usually deserved it.

Description: Caption on a picture of the real cat, Angus
US English: He was the only cat I ever met who liked to have his belly rubbed. His massive, fuzzy white belly...

Description: Caption on a picture of the real cat, Angus
US English: He was a glutton. If I didn't hold him down at feeding time he'd stick his face and paws into the bag of catfood.

Description: Caption on a picture of the real cat, Angus
US English: You know how some cats carry themselves with an air of dignity and mystery? Angus... not so much...

Description: Caption on a picture of the real cat, Angus
US English: He loved to groom. Start with himself, move on to Curry, then my head. Kind of sweet until the biting part.

Description: Caption on a picture of the real cat, Angus
US English: He was crazy for this little stuffed hedgehog.  He'd bat it around until it got stuck under furniture.  Then this would happen...

Description: Caption on a picture of the real cat, Angus
US English: He was always a big boy but over time he got just enormous. When he laid down he made a puddle of cat.

Description: Caption on a picture of the real cat, Angus
US English: The new kitty condo was a huge success. That red ball thingy lasted about two seconds.

Description: Caption on a picture of the real cat, Angus
US English: Angus was just as sweet and touchable as he looks, and then some. He was like a pot of warm pudding wrapped in a furry blanket.

Description: Caption on a picture of the real cat, Angus
US English: He died in August 2014. Broke my heart. We miss you, Angus...

Description: Dialog: rate the app?
US English: Like Lazy Angus?\nGive us a 5-star review!

Description: yes, rate the app
US English: OK!

Description: rate the app some other time
US English: Later...

Description: no I don't want to rate the app
US English: No thanks...

Description: Pay $$ to access new features and turn off ads?
US English: Buy the Lazy Upgrade!\n\nHide ads and change my fur!

Description: Click here if you're interested to learn more
US English: How much?

Description: Click here if you're not interested.
US English: No thanks...
